question: Is it Halaal to give a house for 2 years lease for RS. 200,000 and when the tenant vacant the house after 2 years the owner of the house return RS. 200,000
answer:
QUESTION

Is it Halaal to give a house for 2 years lease for RS. 200,000 and when the tenant vacant the house after 2 years the owner of the house return RS. 200,000 without any deduction for the stay.

ANSWER


Share:

The contract is permissible as the Rs200,00 will be regarded as a deposit given to the lessor for occupying his house.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
